comments:
I am getting the following error on console (not in the error log) on every Eclipse restart. I would expect that error should go away after the first appearance...

Also if using Serialization it is always good idea to explicitly specify serialVersionUID and maybe even use revision id in combination with some custom deserealization.

java.io.InvalidClassException: org.eclipse.mylar.provisional.bugzilla.core.BugzillaReport; local class incompatible: stream classdesc serial

Yes, this should be going away.  Rob is in the process of redoing the offline storage (bug 144998), and may move to storing individual XML files instead one big serialized dump, but I'll put this on his list as a reminder.

If this keeps recurring you may want to remove the file in: 

  .metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.mylar.bugzilla.core
Added check for failure to delete old serialization file (will log if occurs). This should never occur, please reopen if you see this again.
